response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This product, tailored specifically to your needs and preferences, is priced at $1,300,000. Given its significance to both of us, I believe this offer strikes a balance between our respective valuations. I look forward to discussing how this product can enrich your life and contribute to your endeavors. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both parties.", "product_price": 1300000}
